description:
Glen attacks Alina and Silver Sword ruthlessly, but they still cling to the hope of saving him.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A céh egy recepciósa vagyok, de a végsőkig küzdök a túlóra ellen
Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga, Zangyou Kaihi no Tame Saigo made Tatakau to Omoimasu
I May Be a Guild Receptionist, but I`ll Fight to the Bitter End to Get Out of Working Overtime
ギルドの受付嬢ですが, 残業回避のため最後まで戦おうと思います
